snippet: We wanted high tea: the tradition, I imagined, where you scanned a topography of tiny cakes and indulged in complex thoughts about roses or simple thoughts about art.
abstract: Loose Ends column by writer and comedian Steve Macone describes visiting London and wanting to experience the tradition of high tea, only to discover that his conception of the tradition was entirely apocryphal.
lead_paragraph: We wanted high tea: the tradition, I imagined, where you scanned a topography of tiny cakes and indulged in complex thoughts about roses or simple thoughts about art.
